short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur the thumbnails of episodes on Crunchyroll to avoid spoilers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never be spoiled by glancing at a thumbnail again. Crunchyroll Thumbnail Blur prevents you from seeing potential spoilers by blurring them.

This extension checks the HTML of the Crunchyroll page you are currently on for any thumbnails and automatically blurs them.

Supports only Crunchyroll.
